displayName.japanese: ショベルナイトの勝利

description.english: Save everyone from the Pocket Dungeon as Shovel Knight.
description.german: Rette als Shovel Knight alle aus dem Pocket Dungeon
description.french: Sauver tous les prisonniers du Donjon de Poche avec Shovel Knight
description.italian: Salva tutti dal Pocket Dungeon nei panni di Shovel Knight
description.koreana: 포켓 던전에서 삽 기사로 모두를 구함.
description.spanish: Usa a Shovel Knight para salvar a todo el mundo de la Mazmorra de Bolsillo.
description.schinese: 使用铲子骑士将每个人从口袋地牢中救出来
description.tchinese: 以鏟子騎士身分從袖珍地牢中救出所有人
description.russian: Лопатный рыцарь спасает всех из Карманного подземелья
description.japanese:
ショベルナイトを使って、全員をポケットダンジョンから
救出する
description.brazilian: Salve todos do Pocket Dungeon como Shovel Knight.

displayName.japanese: ショベルナイトを開放

description.english: Recruit Shovel Knight to help solve the Pocket Dungeon.
description.german: Heuere Shovel Knight an, um dir im Pocket Dungeon helfen zu lassen
description.french: Recruter Shovel Knight pour résoudre les mystères du Donjon de Poche
description.italian: Recluta Shovel Knight per aiutarti a risolvere Pocket Dungeon
description.koreana: 포켓 던전을 풀기 위해 삽 기사를 고용.
description.spanish: Recluta a Shovel Knight para que te ayude a resolver la Mazmorra de Bolsillo.
description.schinese: 招募铲子骑士来帮忙解决口袋地牢
description.tchinese: 徵招鏟子騎士協助解開袖珍地牢的謎題
description.russian: Нанять Лопатного рыцаря и вместе пройти Карманное подземелье
description.japanese:
ショベルナイトを仲間にして、ポケットダンジョンの
攻略を手伝ってもらう
description.brazilian: Recrute Shovel Knight para ajudar a resolver o Pocket Dungeon.

description.tchinese: 徵招極地騎士協助解開袖珍地牢的謎題
description.russian: Нанять Полярного рыцаря и вместе пройти Карманное подземелье
description.japanese:
フロストナイトを仲間にして、ポケットダンジョンの
攻略を手伝ってもらう
description.brazilian: Recrute Polar Knight para ajudar a resolver o Pocket Dungeon.

displayName.japanese: ブラックナイトを開放

description.english: Recruit Black Knight to help solve the Pocket Dungeon.

description.french: Recruter Black Knight pour résoudre les mystères du Donjon de Poche
description.italian: Recluta Black Knight per aiutarti a risolvere Pocket Dungeon
description.koreana: 포켓 던전을 풀기 위해 흑기사를 고용.
description.spanish: Recluta a Black Knight para que te ayude a resolver la Mazmorra de Bolsillo.

description.tchinese: 徵招暗黑騎士協助解開袖珍地牢的謎題
description.russian: Нанять Черного рыцаря и вместе пройти Карманное подземелье
description.japanese:

description.spanish: Recluta a Scrap Knight para que te ayude a resolver la Mazmorra de Bolsillo.

description.tchinese: 徵招廢料騎士協助解開袖珍地牢的謎題

displayName.japanese: プリズムナイトを開放

description.english: Recruit Prism Knight to help solve the Pocket Dungeon.
description.german: Heuere Prism Knight an, um dir im Pocket Dungeon helfen zu lassen
description.french: Recruter Prism Knight pour résoudre les mystères du Donjon de Poche
description.italian: Recluta Prism Knight per aiutarti a risolvere Pocket Dungeon
description.koreana: 포켓 던전을 풀기 위해 프리즘 기사를 고용.
description.spanish: Recluta a Prism Knight para que te ayude a resolver la Mazmorra de Bolsillo.
description.schinese: 招募棱镜骑士来帮忙解决口袋地牢
description.tchinese: 徵招稜鏡騎士協助解開袖珍地牢的謎題
description.russian: Нанять Призмового рыцаря и вместе пройти Карманное подземелье
description.japanese:
プリズムナイトを仲間にして、ポケットダンジョンの
攻略を手伝ってもらう
description.brazilian: Recrute Prism Knight para ajudar a resolver o Pocket Dungeon.

description.english: Destroy 20 enemies with Shovel Knight's extra chain damage in a single run.
description.german: Vernichte bei einem Durchgang 20 Gegner mit Shovel Knights Extra-Ketten-Schaden
description.french: Détruire 20 ennemis avec les dégâts de chaîne supplémentaires de Shovel Knight en un parcours
description.italian: Distruggi 20 nemici con il danno extra a catena di Shovel Knight in un'unica partita
description.koreana: 삽 기사의 추가 연쇄 피해로 1턴 안에 20마리의 적을 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Acaba con 20 enemigos con el daño extra de cadena de Shovel Knight en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在一次奔跑中，用铲子骑士的额外连锁伤害消灭20个敌人
description.tchinese: 單一回合中，以鏟子騎士附加的鎖鏈傷害消滅20個敵人
description.russian: Уничтожить 20 врагов Лопатным рыцарем, нанеся урон цепочками в одном подходе.
description.japanese:
ショベルナイトの追加連鎖ダメージを生かして
1連で20体の敵を倒す
description.brazilian: Destrua 20 inimigos com o dano extra de sequência de Shovel Knight em uma única sessão.

description.english: Lose 4 HP or fewer in a single level as Shield Knight.
description.german: Verliere als Shield Knight max. 4 TP in einem Level
description.french: Perdre 4 PV ou moins dans un niveau en jouant Shield Knight
description.italian: Non perdere più di 4 punti salute in un unico livello come Shield Knight
description.koreana: 방패 기사로 HP를 4이하의 피해만 입은 상태로 레벨을 끝냄.
description.spanish: Pierde 4 de salud o menos en un mismo nivel con Shield Knight.
description.schinese: 使用圆盾骑士，在一个关卡中失去4点（或更少）生命值。
description.tchinese: 用護盾騎士以損失少於4點HP通過一關卡
description.russian: Потерять 4 ОЗ или менее на одном уровне, играя Щитовым рыцарем.
description.japanese:
シールドナイトを使用し、4以下のダメージで
ステージをクリアする
description.brazilian: Perca 4 PV ou menos em um único nível como Shield Knight.

description.english: Defeat a boss with a 5+ damage Bash as King Knight.
description.german: Besiege als King Knight einen Endgegner mit einem Stoß von über 5 Schaden
description.french: Vaincre un boss avec une Charge de 5+ dégâts en jouant King Knight
description.italian: Sconfiggi un boss con un colpo da 5+ di danno nei panni di King Knight
description.koreana: 제왕 기사로 +5 피해 후려치기를 사용해 보스를 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Usa a King Knight para derrotar a un jefe con una carga de 5 o más de daño.
description.schinese: 使用国王骑士，以伤害为5点以上的痛击打败一个头目
description.tchinese: 用國王騎士使出5+的重擊傷害打倒BOSS
description.russian: Победить босса ударом плеча с 5+ уроном в качестве Короля-рыцаря
description.japanese:
キングナイトのバッシュを使用し、ボスに5以上の
ダメージを与えて倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote um chefe com 5+ de dano de Ombrada como King Knight.

description.english: Finish a level without collecting a Potion or turkey as Specter Knight.
description.german: Schließe als Specter Knight einen Level ab, ohne einen Trank oder einen Truthahn aufzusammeln
description.french: Terminer un niveau sans récupérer de potion ni de dinde en jouant Specter Knight
description.italian: Finisci un livello senza raccogliere pozioni o tacchini nei panni di Specter Knight
description.koreana: 망령 기사로 포션이나 칠면조를 먹지 않고 레벨을 완료.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel sin obtener ninguna poción o pavo mientras usas a Specter Knight.
description.schinese: 使用幽灵骑士，在不收集药水或火鸡的情况下完成一个关卡
description.tchinese: 用幽魂騎士未飲用藥水或吃火雞結束一關卡
description.russian: Пройти уровень Призрачным рыцарем, не подбирая зелье и индеек
description.japanese:
スペクターナイトを使用し、ポーションや肉を食べずに
ステージをクリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível sem coletar poções nem perus como Specter Knight.

description.english: Defeat 20 enemies with poison in one level as Plague Knight
description.german: Besiege in einem Level als Plague Knight 20 Gegner durch Gift
description.french: Vaincre 20 ennemis avec du poison en jouant Plague Knight
description.italian: Sconfiggi 20 nemici col veleno in un livello come Plague Knight
description.koreana: 역병 기사로 독을 사용해 적 20마리를 쓰러뜨림
description.spanish: Con Plague Knight, derrota a 20 enemigos con veneno en un mismo nivel.
description.schinese: 使用瘟疫骑士，在一个关卡中以毒药打败20个敌人
description.tchinese: 用瘟疫騎士在一關卡用毒藥擊潰20個敵人
description.russian: Победить 20 врагов на одном уровне с помощью яда Чумным рыцарем
description.japanese: プレイグナイトを使用し、1ステージ中に20体の敵を倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote 20 inimigos com veneno em um nível como Plague Knight

description.english: Hoard 50,000 Gems as Treasure Knight.
description.german: Raffe als Treasure Knight 50.000 Edelsteine zusammen
description.french: Cumuler 50⍽000 gemmes en jouant Treasure Knight
description.italian: Accumula 50.000 gemme nei panni di Treasure Knight
description.koreana: 보물 기사로 보석 50,000개를 모음.
description.spanish: Amasa 50 000 gemas con Treasure Knight.
description.schinese: 使用宝藏骑士囤积50000颗宝石
description.tchinese: 用寶藏騎士積攢了五萬顆寶石
description.russian: Накопить 50 000 алмазов Алчным рыцарем
description.japanese: トレジャーナイトを使用し、50000ジェム集める
description.brazilian: Acumule 50.000 joias como Treasure Knight.

description.english: Construct your mech 10 times in one level as Tinker Knight.
description.german: Bau als Tinker Knight 10 Mal in einem Level deinen Mech.
description.french: Construire 10 fois votre robot au cours d'un même niveau en jouant Tinker Knight.
description.italian: Fabbrica il tuo mech 10 volte in un livello come Tinker Knight
description.koreana: 땜장이 기사로 25턴 연속으로 메크를 유지.
description.spanish: Construye tu mech 10 veces en un nivel con Tinker Knight.
description.schinese: 使用修补骑士，在一个关卡中建造机甲10次
description.tchinese: 以修補騎士的身份，在一關卡建構你的機械。
description.russian: Построить робота 10 раз на одном уровне Инженерным рыцарем.
description.japanese: マシンナイトを使用し、25ターン連続でメカに乗り続ける
description.brazilian: Construa seu mecha 10 vezes em um nível como Tinker Knight.

description.english: Avoid damage 10 times using Mole Knight's burrow in a single run.
description.german: Vermeide als Mole Knight durch Buddeln in einem Durchgang 10 Mal Schaden
description.french: Éviter 10 fois des dégâts en utilisant la capacité d'enfouissement de Mole Knight en un parcours.
description.italian: Evita danni per 10 volte scavando cunicoli come Mole Knight in una sola partita
description.koreana: 두더지 기사의 숨기 능력으로 한 게임에서 피해를 10회 회피.
description.spanish: Evita 10 veces que te hagan daño en una misma partida usando el Escarbar de Mole Knight.
description.schinese: 在一次奔跑中，使用鼹鼠骑士的地洞躲避伤害10次
description.tchinese: 單一回合中，使用鼴鼠騎士的鑽地技能躲過傷害10次
description.russian: Избежать урона, копая Подземным рыцарем, 10 раз за один проход
description.japanese:
モールナイトの穴掘りを使用して、1度に10回の
ダメージを避ける
description.brazilian: Evite dano 10 vezes usando a toca de Mole Knight em uma única sessão de jogo.

description.english: Slay a boss in fewer than 5 strikes as Propeller Knight.
description.german: Erledige als Propeller Knight einen Endgegner mit weniger als 5 Angriffen
description.french: Tuer un boss en moins de 5 coups en jouant Propeller Knight
description.italian: Uccidi un boss con meno di 5 colpi come Propeller Knight
description.koreana: 프로펠러 기사로 5회 공격 안에 보스를 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Mata a un jefe en menos de 5 golpes con Propeller Knight.
description.schinese: 使用旋翼骑士，以少于5次的袭击屠杀一个头目
description.tchinese: 用螺旋槳騎士5擊之內打倒BOSS
description.russian: Уничтожить босса менее чем за 5 ударов Летучим рыцарем
description.japanese: プロペラナイトを使用し、ボスを5撃以内で倒す
description.brazilian: Mate um chefe em menos de 5 golpes como Propeller Knight.

description.english: Slay 50 frozen enemies in one level as Polar Knight.
description.german: Besiege als Polar Knight 50 gefrorene Feinde in einem Level.
description.french: Tuer 50 ennemis gelés au cours d'un même niveau en jouant Polar Knight.
description.italian: Uccidi 50 nemici congelati in un livello come Polar Knight
description.koreana: 극지 기사로 한 레벨에서 얼어붙은 적 50을 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos congelados en un mismo nivel con Polar Knight.
description.schinese: 使用极地骑士，在一个关卡中屠杀50个敌人
description.tchinese: 以極地騎士的身份，在一關卡宰殺50個結凍的敵人。
description.russian: Победить 50 замороженных врагов на одном уровне Полярным рыцарем.
description.japanese:
フロストナイトを使用し、1ステージ中に凍った敵を
50体倒す
description.brazilian: Mate 50 inimigos congelados em um nível como Polar Knight.

description.english: Boost to 8 base attack as Black Knight.
description.german: Booste als Black Knight deinen Basis-Angriff auf 8
description.french: Monter l'attaque de base à 8 en jouant Black Knight
description.italian: Lancia 8 attacchi base come Black Knight
description.koreana: 흑기사로 공격력을 8회 강화.
description.spanish: Logra 8 de ataque básico con Black Knight.
description.schinese: 使用黑衣骑士，提升为8点基础攻击力
description.tchinese: 用暗黑騎士增強八種基本攻擊
description.russian: Усилить базовую атаку до 8, как Черный рыцарь
description.japanese: ブラックナイトを使用し、攻撃を8段階まで強化する
description.brazilian: Incremente para 8 o ataque base como Black Knight.

description.english: Destroy a chain of 10 enemies, 5 times in a single level, as Scrap Knight.
description.german: Vernichte als Scrap Knight in einem einzigen Level 5 Mal 10 Ketten von Gegnern
description.french: Détruire 5 fois en un seul niveau une chaîne de 10 ennemis en jouant Scrap Knight.
description.italian: Distruggi una catena di 10 nemici per 5 volte in un solo livello come Scrap Knight
description.koreana: 약탈 기사로 한 레벨에서 연쇄로 10마리의 적을 5번 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Con Scrap Knight, insiste hasta destruir cadenas de 10 enemigos 5 veces en un mismo nivel.
description.schinese: 使用废料骑士，在一个关卡中5次消灭连锁的10个敌人
description.tchinese: 用廢料騎士在單一關卡中，殲滅鎖鏈綁起的10隻敵人，次數達五次
description.russian: Уничтожить цепочку из 10 врагов 5 раз за один проход, как Мусорный рыцарь
description.japanese:
スクラップナイトを使用し、連鎖で10体の敵を倒すことを
1ステージ中に5回行う
description.brazilian: Destrua 5 vezes uma sequência de 10 inimigos em um único nível como Scrap Knight.

description.english: Finish a level taking fewer than 10 steps as Prism Knight.
description.german: Schließe als Prism Knight einen Level mit weniger als 10 Schritten ab
description.french: Terminer un niveau en ayant fait moins de 10 pas en jouant Prism Knight.
description.italian: Finisci un livello compiendo meno di 10 passi come Prism Knight
description.koreana: 프리즘 기사로 한 레벨을 10회 미만 이동해서 완료.
description.spanish: Completa un nivel con Prism Knight dando menos de 10 pasos.
description.schinese: 使用棱镜骑士，以少于10步完成一个关卡
description.tchinese: 用稜鏡騎士以少於10個位移通過一關卡
description.russian: Пройти уровень за менее чем 10 шагов, как Призмовый рыцарь
description.japanese:
プリズムナイトを使用し、1ステージを10歩未満で
クリアする
description.brazilian: Conclua um nível dando menos de 10 passos como Prism Knight.

description.english: Purchase every unlockable Relic from Chester's campfire shop.
description.german: Kaufe jedes freischaltbare Relikt bei Kistians Lagerfeuer-Laden
description.french: Acheter toutes les Reliques déblocables dans la boutique de Chester près du feu de camp
description.italian: Acquista ogni reliquia sbloccabile al negozio del falò di Chester
description.koreana: 체스터의 야영지 상점에서 해금 가능한 유물을 전부 구매.
description.spanish: Compra todas las reliquias desbloqueables de la tienda de Chester en el campamento.
description.schinese: 从切斯特的篝火商店购买所有可解锁的神器
description.tchinese: 跟切斯特在其營地商店購買所有不可解鎖的古物
description.russian: Купить все бонусные реликвии в лавке Честера
description.japanese:
キャンプファイアそばのチェスターの店で、入手可能な
レリックをすべて購入する
description.brazilian: Comprar todas as relíquias desbloqueáveis na loja da fogueira de Chester.

description.english: Have 10 Relics at once.
description.german: Besitze 10 Relikte gleichzeitig
description.french: Posséder 10 Reliques en même temps
description.italian: Accumula 10 reliquie
description.koreana: 한 번에 10개의 유물을 획득.
description.spanish: Ten 10 reliquias a la vez.
description.schinese: 一次性拥有10个神器
description.tchinese: 一次擁有十件古物
description.russian: Получить 10 реликвий за раз
description.japanese: 同時に10個のレリックを所持する
description.brazilian: Tenha 10 relíquias de uma só vez.

description.english: Deal at least 5 damage to a single enemy in one strike.
description.german: Füge einem Gegner mit einem Schlag mindestens 5 Schaden zu
description.french: Infliger au moins 5 dégâts à un seul ennemi en un coup
description.italian: Infliggi almeno 5 punti di danno a uno stesso nemico in un colpo
description.koreana: 적 하나에게 1회 공격으로 최소 5 피해를 줌.
description.spanish: Inflige un mínimo de 5 de daño a un solo enemigo con un solo golpe.
description.schinese: 在一次袭击中对一个敌人造成至少5点伤害
description.tchinese: 單一攻擊內，造成單一敵人至少5點傷害
description.russian: Нанести не менее 5 ед. урона одному врагу за один удар
description.japanese: 1体の敵に対して、1撃で5以上のダメージを与える
description.brazilian: Cause pelo menos 5 de dano a um único inimigo em um só golpe.

description.english: Deal at least 10 damage to a single enemy in one strike.
description.german: Füge einem Gegner mit einem Schlag mindestens 10 Schaden zu
description.french: Infliger au moins 10 dégâts à un seul ennemi en un coup
description.italian: Infliggi almeno 10 punti di danno a uno stesso nemico in un colpo
description.koreana: 적 하나에게 1회 공격으로 최소 10 피해를 줌.
description.spanish: Inflige un mínimo de 10 de daño a un solo enemigo con un solo golpe.
description.schinese: 在一次袭击中对一个敌人造成至少10点伤害
description.tchinese: 單一攻擊內，造成單一敵人至少10點傷害
description.russian: Нанести не менее 10 ед. урона одному врагу за один удар
description.japanese: 1体の敵に対して、1撃で10以上のダメージを与える
description.brazilian: Cause pelo menos 10 de dano a um único inimigo em um só golpe.

description.english: Slay 10 enemies in a single action.
description.german: Erledige 10 Gegner mit einer Aktion
description.french: Éliminer 10 ennemis en une seule action
description.italian: Uccidi 10 nemici con una sola azione
description.koreana: 한 번 행동으로 10마리의 적을 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos con una sola acción.
description.schinese: 一个动作屠杀10个敌人
description.tchinese: 單一動作內擊殺10隻敵人
description.russian: Убить 10 врагов одним приемом
description.japanese: 1アクションで10体の敵を倒す

description.french: Éliminer 25 ennemis en une seule action

description.brazilian: Mate 25 inimigos com uma única ação.

description.english: Slay 50 enemies in a single action.
description.german: Erledige 50 Gegner mit einer Aktion
description.french: Éliminer 50 ennemis en une seule action
description.italian: Uccidi 50 nemici con una sola azione
description.koreana: 한 번 행동으로 50마리의 적을 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Mata a 50 enemigos con una sola acción.
description.schinese: 一个动作屠杀50个敌人
description.tchinese: 單一動作內擊殺50隻敵人
description.russian: Убить 50 врагов одним приемом
description.japanese: 1アクションで50体の敵を倒す
description.brazilian: Mate 50 inimigos com uma única ação.

description.english: Unlock every costume for one character.
description.german: Schalte alle Kostüme für einen Charakter frei
description.french: Débloquer tous les costumes pour un personnage
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i costumi per un personaggio
description.koreana: 한 캐릭터의 모든 복장을 해금.
description.spanish: Desbloquea todos los trajes de un personaje.
description.schinese: 解锁一个角色的所有服装
description.tchinese: 解鎖某一角色所有服裝
description.russian: Открыть все костюмы одного персонажа
description.japanese:
いずれかのキャラクターのコスチュームを
すべて開放する
description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todas as roupas de um personagem.

description.english: Defeat Puzzle Knight.
description.german: Besiege Puzzle Knight
description.french: Vaincre Puzzle Knight
description.italian: Sconfiggi Puzzle Knight
description.koreana: 퍼즐 기사를 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Derrota a Puzzle Knight.
description.schinese: 打败谜题骑士
description.tchinese: 擊倒拼圖騎士
description.russian: Победить Загадочного рыцаря
description.japanese: パズルナイトを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote Puzzle Knight.

description.english: Collect 100,000 Gems in a single run.
description.german: Hol dir in einem Durchgang 100.000 Edelsteine
description.french: Récupérer 100⍽000 gemmes en un seul parcours
description.italian: Raccogli 100.000 gemme in una partita
description.koreana: 한 게임에서 보석을 100,000개 획득.
description.spanish: Consigue 100 000 gemas en una misma partida.
description.schinese: 在一次奔跑中收集100,000颗宝石
description.tchinese: 單一回合蒐集到10萬顆寶石
description.russian: Собрать 100 000 алмазов за один проход
description.japanese: 1度に100000ジェムを入手する
description.brazilian: Recolha 100.000 joias em uma única sessão de jogo.

description.english: Defeat Puzzle Knight without any Relics.
description.german: Besiege Puzzle Knight ohne Relikte
description.french: Vaincre Puzzle Knight sans aucune Relique
description.italian: Sconfiggi Puzzle Knight senza reliquie
description.koreana: 유물을 하나도 보유하지 않은 채로 퍼즐 기사를 쓰러뜨림.
description.spanish: Derrota a Puzzle Knight sin ninguna reliquia.
description.schinese: 在不使用任何神器的情况下，打败谜题骑士
description.tchinese: 未使用古物即擊倒拼圖騎士
description.russian: Победить Загадочного рыцаря без реликвий
description.japanese: レリックを使用せずにパズルナイトを倒す
description.brazilian: Derrote Puzzle Knight sem nenhuma relíquia.

description.english: Score 100 points in Mona's minigame.
description.german: Erreiche 100 Punkte bei Monas Minispiel.
description.french: Marquer 100 points dans le mini-jeu de Mona.
description.italian: Ottieni 100 punti nel minigioco di Mona
description.koreana: 모나의 미니게임에서 100점을 달성한다.
description.spanish: Suma 100 puntos en el minijuego de Mona.
description.schinese: 在莫娜的迷你游戏中获得100个点数
description.tchinese: 玩莫娜的小遊戲拿到100分。
description.russian: Получить 100 очков в мини-игре Моны.
description.japanese: モナのミニゲームで100ポイントを達成する
description.brazilian: Obtenha 100 pontos no minijogo da Mona.
